8500 Series
Elevator Batch Oven

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”link_option_url” _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.2em” transform_translate_linked=”off” custom_padding=”12px||||false|false” link_option_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wb3N0Iiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwNyJ9fQ==@” border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#AAAAAA” global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-8px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” text_text_color__hover=”#DDDDDD” text_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover”]

9500 Series
Advanced Innovation

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The SierraThermal 8500 Series is designed for applications of up to 1050°C. Technologically advanced heating elements and control systems work together to create exceptionally stable temperature uniformity and repeatability throughout the process chamber.  The easy to load chamber is designed for batch processing in a precisely controlled air atmosphere.   

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#efefef” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

High-temperature precision batch processing applications

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.1″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

The 8500 Series Elevator Batch Oven from SierraThermal is designed for precision processing in manufacturing operations requiring performance of the highest quality and consistency. Rated to 1050 °C, these ovens feature an ultra-clean low-mass refractory heating chamber. Multiple vertical heated zones, as well as power trimming to all four element panels (left, right, front, back) provide for precise temperature stability and control throughout the process chamber. A sophisticated atmosphere inlet and exhaust system features four independently adjustable gas inlets and corresponding exhaust ports to efficiently extract burn-off effluents throughout the process chamber. Multiple tiers of graded, power-saving insulation keep energy bills low, even at the highest processing temperatures.

SierraThermal’s innovative and product specific atmosphere distribution and management systems optimize the process results. Thorough extraction of burn-off effluents across the entire chamber height and width keeps part yields high.

The Furnace Monitoring System (FMS) is the culmination of decades of thermal processing expertise and incorporates the latest technology in digital controls and monitoring systems. The result is a powerful yet intuitive interface with comprehensive data logging, process control, and process characterization features. All process parameters, including temperatures, flows, and exhaust levels, are fully programmable for recipe design flexibility and precision.  Online help and remote diagnostic tools are also available to keep the oven performing at its peak day after day, year after year.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Applications:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Low Temperature Cofired Ceramic (LTCC)

Other high-temperature long-cycle air atmosphere applications

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Benefits:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]Precisely distributed atmosphere introduction and exhaust insure a consistently clean and uniform atmosphere

Heating element control features maximize temperature flexibility and uniformity

Practically unlimited process parameter recipe programming

Many optional features available including exhaust treatment afterburner[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Technical Data:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Maximum temperature rating:
1050° C

Atmosphere Control:
Air atmospheres only

Heating:
Ceramic fiber block with embedded resistive wire heating elements

Oven Dimensions:  1.78 x 1.78 x 2.24m.
Process Chamber Dimensions:  610 x 610 x 610 mm

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_module=”517″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” link_text_color=”#B71C1C” header_text_align=”center” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_4_text_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”32px||||false|false” border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#DDDDDD” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ready to learn more?

Contact our sales team: sales@s-thermal.com

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
